text:
In the ultimate friendship-defining moment, model powerhouses and everybody's favorite off-duty BFFs Kendall Jenner and Gigi Hadid star alongside one another in Fendi’s latest campaign.

The new campaign, titled “F en Folie” (which translates to “F in Craziness”), features Jenner and Hadid decked out in the new fall collection. The two pose around life-size versions of the fashion house’s new monogram logo, “F is Fendi,” in the playful (yet super-luxe) Karl Lagerfeld-shot photo series.

Whether they’re twinning in jewel-toned dresses or showing off the brand’s latest and greatest sheer organza evening wear and winter-ready coats, we can’t help but dream of what fall fashion has in store for us—even if we’re deep into summer. Oh, and those colorful F hoop earrings? They’d send any logo enthusiast’s heart aflutter. Hair extraordinaire Sam McKnight kept Jenner’s locks sleek and straight and gave Hadid a retro-inspired ‘do, while both sported smoldering makeup by Peter Phillips. (Thanks to them, we now know what our go-to fall beauty looks will be.)

But really, what’s a bigger BFF milestone than starring alongside your pal in a luxury fashion campaign? If they weren't considered fashion icons before, they certainly are now.

Click through the gallery below to check out the campaign in full.
title: BFFs Kendall And Gigi Just Scored A New Fashion Campaign
